title: Swarna Vanki: Diamond-Studded Gold Bangles
materials: G-H color). Features traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting lustre.
features: These exquisite gold vankis showcase a classic linked design. Each link features a prong-set brilliant-cut Diamond. The minimal gold setting maximizes the sparkle of each stone, creating a dazzling effect. The bangles are meticulously handcrafted in our Hyderabad workshop.
occasions: and special occasions. Can also be worn as an everyday statement piece.
description: Timeless elegance meets modern design. These Vanki bangles are not just jewelry; they are an heirloom piece. The high-quality gold and diamonds ensure lasting value and brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of traditional craftsmanship, making it a true collector's item.
